title: Shipping Simplified
seoDescription: Click here to sign up for a free Shippo account to start saving up to 90% on your e-commerce shipments today. Compare shipping rates and services all in one place
passwordMessage: Must be 8+ characters and cannot be a commonly used password
emailNotif: Yes, I'd like to receive email tips and news from Shippo

customerQuote: Shippo helps us create, download, and print labels quicker than ever. Now we don’t have to sit for long periods entering shipment information to get labels—which frees up our time to do other things, like sourcing the finest goods made in Portland!

rightContent.title: Over 100 Million Packages Shipped a Year on Shippo

dhl_express.line2: Save up to 63% on DHL rates
